segments.text: I notice the woman so absorbed in her dish drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink behind her is flooding the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading down like tears, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea the trouble brewing at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to mischief with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's so precarious on that stool; it's heartbreaking to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister looks so eager, but this could go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems idyllic, a stark contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for what might happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies might not even be worth the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic scene turned risky makes me melancholic.
segments.speaker: PAR
